## üóÉÔ∏è Tables

### `todos`

Represents a todo item in the application.

**Properties:**

- `title`: `string`
- `description`: `string`
- `isCompleted`: `bool`
- `priority`: `DesktopApp.Models.TodoPriority`
- `createdAt`: `double`
- `updatedAt`: `double`
- `dueDate`: `double?` (optional)
- `tags`: `List<string>`
- `category`: `string`

**Indexes:**

- `createdAt`
- `updatedAt`

**Search Indexes:**

- `title` (full-text search)
- `description` (full-text search)

## üîß Available Functions

Each table includes the following auto-generated functions:

### CRUD Operations
- `create` - Create a new document
- `get` - Get a document by ID
- `list` - List all documents
- `listPaginated` - List documents with cursor pagination
- `update` - Update a document
- `delete` - Delete a document

### Query Operations
- `count` - Count all documents
- `exists` - Check if a document exists
- `deleteMany` - Batch delete multiple documents

### Search Functions
- `todos.searchByTitle` - Full-text search by title
- `todos.searchByDescription` - Full-text search by description

## üöÄ Usage Examples

```typescript
import { api } from "./_generated/api";

// Create a new document
const newId = await ctx.runMutation(api.todos.create, {
  title: "Sample",
  description: "Sample",
});

// Get a document
const doc = await ctx.runQuery(api.todos.get, { id: newId });

// List with pagination
const { page, isDone } = await ctx.runQuery(api.todos.listPaginated, { limit: 10 });
```
